name: Unstoppable Knight Mobile
description:
How long will you survive? Avoid obstacles and collect coins. You can play the web version on you desktop but I recommend play the game on mobile

Mobile remake (Android only at the moment) of my Game Boy game. Since this didn't have the limitations of the original GB, this version have more enemies and obstacles on the screen. The bomb obstacle will appear on the game boy version too.

Touch the sides of the game screen to move left or right
